App Check

Application Security

CONTACT US

Protecting developers from revenue loss, hackers tampering with in-game purchase systems, source code theft, fraud, or application credentials being compromised

Four major protection functions

Prevents reverse engineering and decompilation

Exclusive special encryption method that hides the source code completely

Blocks debuggers to prevent memory modifications

Special monitoring and protection technology to prevent the memory from being modified

Integrity check

Checks the integrity of App to ensure that the App is genuine

Encryption and binding of sensitive information

Performs complete encryption to the sensitive information of the App

Service Features

No source code required

Protect App directly no need to learn how to embed SDK

Fastest service

Preparation to acceptance in less than 20 working days

Information security protection

No source code required to complete protection

Cloud protection

Cloud protection can be revised and used any time

Best compatibility

All major development languages can be protected, increasing the file size by approximately 300KB

Security strength guaranteed

TAF certified laboratory certification

Largest number of users

Global end-users who use the App exceeded 20 million users

企業方案 IT 服務 / 解決方案諮詢
歡迎聯繫智慧資安

uniXecure 提供資安管理循環，提供 事前預防、事中偵測、事後應處 完整一站式資安服務，滿足營運及落實資安需求。以全天候 24x7 小時維運服務，整合人員、技術與程序，解決資安合規性、資安人才缺乏窘境，並與企業一起因應日益嚴峻的資安挑戰，守護企業的資訊安全，協助企業無後顧之憂發展組織核心業務。
